label: thm-killing-rate-consistency
name: Consistency of the Interior Killing Rate Approximation

attributes_added.label: attr-exit-rate-pointwise-limit
attributes_added.expression: lim_{τ→0} τ^{-1} p_exit(x,v,τ) = c(x,v) with c(x,v) = ((v·n_x(x))^+)/d(x) · 1_{d(x)<δ}

attributes_added.label: attr-expected-killing-fraction-convergence
attributes_added.expression: lim_{τ→0} τ^{-1} K_discrete(τ) = K_continuous; |τ^{-1}K_discrete(τ) − K_continuous| ≤ C(√τ + ||f^τ − f||_{L^1})
